```{r setup}
library(whereami)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Rmarkdown Caption 

```{r rmd caption,fig.cap=whereami(path_expand = TRUE),fig.width=7}

ggplot(iris) + 
  aes(x=Sepal.Length,y=Sepal.Width) + 
  geom_point()

```

## ggplot2 Caption 

```{r ggcaption,fig.width=7}

ggplot(iris) + 
  aes(x=Sepal.Length,y=Sepal.Width) + 
  geom_point() + 
  labs(caption = sprintf('sourced from: %s',whereami(path_expand = TRUE)))

```
